app_analysis.purpose: Track fitness progress through workouts, nutrition, and body measurements to achieve health goals
app_analysis.primary_user_goal: See daily progress toward fitness and nutrition goals at a glance
app_analysis.hero_metric: Today's workout status combined with calorie/protein progress
app_analysis.mental_model: Users think in terms of daily habits - Did I train today? Did I hit my macros? Am I making progress?

theme.distinctive_element: Energetic coral accent with subtle gradient cards, creating a warm and motivating fitness atmosphere
theme.background_treatment: Subtle warm off-white with gentle noise texture feel via CSS

mobile.structure: Single column with sticky header showing today's date, scrollable content with clear section breaks
mobile.hero_element: Today's Progress Ring - circular progress showing workout completion + macro goals

desktop.structure: Two-column layout with main content left (60%) and sidebar right (40%)
desktop.column_arrangement: Left: Hero stats + charts + workout history | Right: Today's nutrition breakdown + goals + quick entry
desktop.sidebar: Nutrition tracker for today with meal breakdown, goals summary, quick add buttons
hover_reveals: Workout card shows full exercise list on hover
Nutrition item shows full macros on hover
